Police officers responding to Hudson Court and Fairview Avenue at 11:46 a.m. found a man shot .
He was treated at the scene and later taken to a hospital with serious but non-life threatening gunshot wounds , police said .
Witnesses reported hearing five or six shots and seeing a dark - colored car drive south on Fairview Avenue toward Somersville Road .
